plot: William Shatner hosts 13 not-quite-Oscar-caliber late-night horror movies, including wacky Q&A sessions with special guests, as well as extra-campy re-enactments of each movie's most-gruesome moment.
plot_en: William Shatner hosts 13 not-quite-Oscar-caliber late-night horror movies, including wacky Q&A sessions with special guests, as well as extra-campy re-enactments of each movie's most-gruesome moment.
plot_es: William Shatner hosts 13 not-quite-Oscar-caliber late-night horror movies, including wacky Q&A sessions with special guests, as well as extra-campy re-enactments of each movie's most-gruesome moment.
title: Full Moon Fright Night
